front.title: JSCalendar: Converting from and to iCalendar

abstract.t: This document defines how to convert calendaring information between the JSCalendar and iCalendar data formats. It considers every JSCalendar and iCalendar element registered at IANA at the time of publication. It defines conversion rules for all elements that are common to both formats, as well as how convert arbitrary or unknown JSCalendar and iCalendar elements. Note This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. This document is unfinished. The term TBD stands for any unknown item.
